channel.title: CVE Feed for getformwork -- formwork
channel.description: The latest CVEs for getformwork -- formwork

item.title: CVE-2024-37160|2024-08-02T03:50:55.370Z -- getformwork -- formwork
item.description: Formwork is a flat file-based Content Management System (CMS). An attackers (requires administrator privilege) to execute arbitrary web scripts by modifying site options via /panel/options/site. This type of attack is suitable for persistence, affecting visitors across all pages (except the dashboard). This vulnerability is fixed in 1.13.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-37160|2024-06-07T17:03:41.148Z -- getformwork -- formwork
item.description: Formwork is a flat file-based Content Management System (CMS). An attackers (requires administrator privilege) to execute arbitrary web scripts by modifying site options via /panel/options/site. This type of attack is suitable for persistence, affecting visitors across all pages (except the dashboard). This vulnerability is fixed in 1.13.1.
